content.summary: A recent graduate with a B.Tech in Electronic and Communication Engineering, driven by a strong desire to advance professionally. Passionate about starting a career in a fast-paced corporate setting and eager to share abilities, wisdom, and creative ideas.

experience.title: Student
experience.company: Gyan Ganga Institute Of Technology And Science, Jabalpur
responsibilities: Developed a Password Generator using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Created Smart Shopping Trolley with Automated Billing System using Arduino, RFID Cards, and Readers.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.objectives: To create a password generator that can generate strong passwords with the option to select length and password components.
projects.contributions: Developed the frontend and backend of the password generator.

projects.title: Smart Shopping Trolley
projects.objectives: To develop an automated billing system for shopping trolleys that reduces waiting times and improves customer experience.
projects.contributions: Designed and implemented the hardware (RFID Cards and Readers) and software (Arduino IDE, C++) aspects of the project.

candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed multiple projects during college tenure.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Collaborated on smart shopping trolley project with team.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effective verbal and written communication skills mentioned.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Strong understanding of core concepts, analytical thinking, work planning, and prioritization.
